Trump Has Reached the Mountaintop  —  Big day for Mike Johnson, whose job and reputation are on the line, to say nothing of his role as dedicated MAGA selfie background guy.  The speaker told reporters this morning he feels confident he can retain his gavel, and do so on the first ballot.

Johnson expected to fail on first vote to reclaim speakership  —  At least one Republican has joined Rep. Thomas Massie in opposing Johnson for speaker on the floor.  —  Mike Johnson is expected to come up short in his bid to remain speaker on the first ballot.
